Life Timer - Visualize and Value Your Time

Life Timer is a Chrome extension that helps you visualize your life timeline, enabling you to better understand and appreciate the value of time through precise calculations and intuitive visualizations.

Key Features and Benefits:

📍 Comprehensive Time Visualization:
* Calculate exact days lived and remaining.
* View life progress through an intuitive progress bar.
* Interactive life calendar showing weeks as blocks.
* Real-time age and expected lifespan display.

📍 Time Value Perspective:
* Convert remaining time into meaningful activities.
* See how many movies you can watch.
* Calculate potential books to read.
* Visualize coffee breaks and good nights of sleep.

📍 User-Friendly Interface:
* Simple date input system.
* Clear progress visualization.
* Interactive weekly life grid.
* Automatic calculation updates.

📍 Personalization:
* Custom birth date setting.
* Adjustable life expectancy.
* Saved preferences between sessions.
* Multilingual support (English/Korean).

Technical Features:

Efficient date calculations and conversions.

Secure data storage using Chrome Storage API.

Responsive design with jQuery.

Localization support for multiple languages.

FAQ:

Q: Are my dates saved between sessions?
A: Yes, both birth date and expected death date are automatically saved.

Q: Can I change the language?
A: Yes, the extension automatically adapts to your browser's language (English/Korean).

Q: Is my data private?
A: Yes, all your data is stored locally in your browser and is never sent to external servers.

Q: Can I modify my expected lifespan?
A: Yes, you can freely adjust your expected death date to see different scenarios.
